screens
Interface Screen

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractScreen, basicJND, BasicScreen, basicUniformJND, ExperimentEndScreen, TestBeginScreen, TestCorrectScreen, TestEndScreen, TestIncorrectScreen, TestLeftScreen, TestOneCorrScreen, TestRightScreen, TestTwoCorrScreen
public interface Screen

The interface for experiment screens.

Each screen has a correct key, an image, and a timeout associated with it.

Method Summary
 int getCorrectKey()
          Get the correct key of this screen.
 java.awt.Image getImage()
          Get the current screen's image.
 float getTimeout()
          Get the timeout of this screen.
 void setCorrectKey(int key)
          Set the key considered "correct" for this screen.
 

Method Detail

getTimeout

float getTimeout()
Get the timeout of this screen.

Returns:
